name: The Caligula Effect: Overdose
description:
Download the backup installer files manually from GOG.
For DLC, download the installers manually from GOG, select "Run EXE inside wine prefix" from Lutris, and select a DLC installer. Do this for each one.

files.game: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Caligula Effect Overdose/COD.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
